token_sale_public_sale_subheading_utilit: To raise the ‚Ç¨3.5m+ needed to finish building our regenerative village, we are selling 18600 tokens that will give the owners of those tokens a lifetime's access to TDF.

token_sale_public_sale_utility_info_1: 1 $TDF = 1 night per year - forever - in a Shared Suite or a Glamping
token_sale_public_sale_utility_info_2: Your $TDF tokens give you access to your chosen accommodation. The utility fee includes energy, water, internet, taxes, food, salaries, maintenance etc.
token_sale_public_sale_utility_info_3: Token holders must go through a Membersheep onboarding process in order to stay more than 14 days. Once verified as member, they get access to ‚Äúinstant book‚Äù. Non-members can submit booking requests.
token_sale_public_sale_utility_info_4: $TDF tokens also give governance rights in the TDF DAO.
